stories.title: Venezuela frees nearly 2,200 under new amnesty lawPublished1 hour agoLawmaker Jorge Arreaza said Monday that releases have surged since the legislation took effect Friday, though critics say many political prisoners remain excluded.43 sources

2026 is deadliest start to a year for Mediterranean migrants, UN says34 sources
Trump weighs new national security tariffs on six industries88 sources

Maryland sues to block ICE detention center near WilliamsportPublished3 hours agoAttorney General Anthony Brown alleges DHS spent $102.4 million on a warehouse without required environmental review or public input.34 sources

Nick Reiner pleads not guilty to murdering parents Rob and Michele Reiner37 sources
Peter Mandelson arrested in probe tied to Epstein39 sources

Johnson says Congress unlikely to codify Trump's tariffs after court rulingPublished3 hours agoThe House speaker said finding legislative consensus on trade policy will be difficult as new 15% tariffs face a July expiration date.73 sources

Congo Basin lakes venting thousands-year-old carbon, study findsPublished14 hours agoTwo large lakes in the Democratic Republic of Congo are releasing ancient peat carbon into the atmosphere, challenging assumptions about tropical carbon storage.34 sources

Dimon says he'll remain JPMorgan CEO for 'a few years'111 sources

Software stocks shed $224B as Anthropic AI tools fuel selloffPublished3 hours agoIBM suffered its worst single-day drop since 2000 after Anthropic detailed how its Claude AI can automate costly COBOL system modernization.65 sources

Exxon seeks compensation from Cuba at Supreme CourtPublished4 hours agoThe energy giant argued Monday that a 1996 law overrides Cuba's sovereign immunity, allowing compensation for assets seized during the 1960 revolution.51 sources
